name: Die With A Smile
lyrics:
Die With A Smile - Lady Gaga/Bruno Mars
TME享有本翻译作品的著作权
Written by：Bruno Mars/Lady Gaga/Dernst "D'Mile" Emile/James Fauntleroy/Andrew Watt
   
Produced by：Bruno Mars/Dernst "D'Mile" Emile/Andrew Watt/Lady Gaga
   
Engineered by：Charles Moniz
   
Assistant Engineered by：Alex Resoagli
   
Mixed by：Serban Ghenea and assisted by Bryce Bordone at MixStar Studios, Virginia Beach, VA
   
Mastered by：Randy Merrill at Sterling Sound Studios, Edgewater, NJ
   
Photography and design by：John v. Esparaza
   
I I just woke up from a dream
我刚从梦里醒来
Where you and I had to say goodbye
梦里 你和我不得不互相道别
And I don't know what it all means
我不知道这一切都意味着什么
But since I survived I realized
但我顽强地挺了过来后 我就意识到
Wherever you go that's where I'll follow
无论你去往哪里 我都愿意跟随
Nobody's promised tomorrow
明日未知 无人敢允诺
So I'mma love you every night like its the last night
所以我会每天晚上都向你献出浓烈爱意 如同明天不会到来 尽数倾付
Like it's the last night
如同明天不会到来 尽数倾付
If the world was ending I'd wanna be next to you
倘若世界会走向终点 我想和你待在一起
If the party was over and our time on Earth was through
如果派对结束 我们在地球上的时间也到了尽头
I'd wanna hold you just for a while
我想抱抱你 就抱一会
And die with a smile
然后我会面带微笑 走向死亡
If the world was ending I'd wanna be next to you
倘若世界会走向终点 我想和你待在一起
Ooh Lost lost in the words that we scream
迷失 迷失在我们大声喊叫出的言语中
I don't even wanna do this anymore
我甚至都不愿再这样证明
Cuz you already know what you mean to me
因为你已经明了 你对我来说有多意义非凡
And our love is the only war worth fighting for
我们的爱情是唯一值得倾力战斗的战争
Wherever you go that's where I'll follow
无论你去往哪里 我都愿意跟随
Nobody's promised tomorrow
明日未知 无人敢允诺
So I'mma love you every night like it's the last night
所以我会每天晚上都向你献出浓烈爱意 如同明天不会到来 尽数倾付
Like it's the last night
如同明天不会到来 尽数倾付
If the world was ending I'd wanna be next to you
倘若世界会走向终点 我想和你待在一起
If the party was over and our time on Earth was through
如果派对结束 我们在地球上的时间也到了尽头
I'd wanna hold you just for a while
我想抱抱你 就抱一会
And die with a smile
然后我会面带微笑 走向死亡
If the world was ending I'd wanna be next to you
倘若世界会走向终点 我想和你待在一起
Right next to you
就在你身边
Next to you
在你身边
Right next to you
就在你身边
If the world was ending I'd wanna be next to you
倘若世界会走向终点 我想和你待在一起
If the party was over and our time on Earth was through
如果派对结束 我们在地球上的时间也到了尽头
I'd wanna hold you just for a while
我想抱抱你 就抱一会
And die with a smile
然后我会面带微笑 走向死亡
If the world was ending I'd wanna be next to you
倘若世界会走向终点 我想和你待在一起
If the world was ending I'd wanna be next to you
倘若世界会走向终点 我想和你待在一起
I'd wanna be next to you
我想和你待在一起

comments.content: 这年头了还有黑lady Gaga的，你可真是无聊[吐]
